cv:
Tamika Schaden JAVA Developer/Senior Systems Engineer - INFOSYS LIMITED
Itarsi, Madhya Pradesh - Email me on Indeed: Alessandra.Volkman@gmail.com
A Dynamic, Hardworking, Focused and Result oriented person with 2 years 10 months of experience in development using Java Technology and other cutting edge technologies. Experience in design and development of enterprise applications using agile methodology. Rich experience in build and deployment process.
Willing to relocate to: Pune, Maharashtra
WORK EXPERIENCE
JAVA Developer/Senior Systems Engineer
INFOSYS LIMITED - Pune, Maharashtra -
February 2016 to Present
Project Idea: The Aetna Quoting Center (AQC) comes under the Aetna Group in Health Industry and its HeadOffice is in Hartford. AQC is a Java enterprise Web based application in Sales Rating and Quoting (SRQ) domain. AQC is developed as a single Rating/Quoting engine for Middle and National Market Customers for new business offering both Traditional and Health Maintenance Organization Products.
AQC is used by the Aetna Sales Representatives and Underwriters for creation of New Business Quotes.A Quote typically comprised of Customer, Member Information along with the Product/ Benefits being offered and the corresponding Premium to be paid for the HealthCare Plan.
Responsibilities: ✓ Analysing business and system requirements and creating design patterns for applications. ✓ Presenting the ideas to client for application and implementing it in the application. ✓ Clear understanding of Requirement gathering and designing phase. Created Detailed Level design (DLD) document of all subsequent releases till date. ✓ Experience in working over deployment process, deploying code over different servers, maintaining deployment documents and handling different task in subsequent releases. ✓ Excellent hands-on in performing request analysis, finding defects and giving code fixes in minimal amount of time. ✓ Resolving Client Issue
Other Responsibilities: ✓ Sharing knowledge with the team by sharing KM tips/quizzes/sessions. ✓ Mentoring 2-3 team members and providing technical guidance in AQC project
JAVA Intern
INFOSYS LIMITED - Mysore, Karnataka -
June 2015 to November 2015
https://www.indeed.com/r/tamika-schaden
Undergone 6 months of internship with Infosys, which includes theoretical as well as hands on experience in Core Java, Hibernate and SQL. - Successfully completed Infosys's Mysore Internship.
EDUCATION
Bachelor of Engineering in Mechanical Eng
ITM University Gwalior - Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh
2015
SKILLS
J2Ee, Sql server, Core Java, Spring mvc, Hibernate, Spring
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
SKILLS Languages: JAVA. Technologies/Frmwks: Hibernate, Spring, Spring MVC. IDE/Tools: Eclipse, Rational Application Development (RAD) Database: SQL Server 2008 Miscellaneous: Xml. OS: Windows
